title: Collaborative Grammar Learning Design Based on the ARCS Model

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Grammar education design combining the ARCS model and collaborative learning in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can design grammar instruction scenarios utilizing ARCS model elements
Learners can improve the effectiveness of grammar instruction materials by 80% or more through peer assessment and feedback
Learners can successfully operate smartphone-based collaborative learning activities in resource-constrained technological environments with 90% or higher success rates

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
